Item.Name: Max number of Program Schedulers
Item.Description: Maximum number of program schedulers supported by the device. Can be eventually adjusted in order to reserve more or less memory.

Item.Name: Current number of Program Schedulers
Item.Description: Number of program schedulers currently allocated.

Item.Name: Max number of Program Functions
Item.Description: Maximum number of program functions supported by the device. Can be eventually adjusted in order to reserve more or less memory.

Item.Name: Current number of Program Functions
Item.Description: Number of program functions currently allocated.

Item.Name: Max number of Calendars
Item.Description: Maximum number of calendars supported by the device. Can be eventually adjusted in order to reserve more or less memory.

Item.Name: Max number of Actuators
Item.Description: Maximum number of target actuators supported. Can be eventually adjusted in order to reserve more or less memory.

Item.Name: Max number of Input Sources
Item.Description: Maximum number of input sources supported. Can be eventually adjusted in order to reserve more or less memory.

Item.Name: Max number of Dates in Calendar
Item.Description: Maximum number of start/end date in Calendar supported. Can be eventually adjusted in order to reserve more or less memory.

Item.Name: Max Flash Memory Allocated
Item.Description: Max flash memory (in bytes) to be allocated. Can be eventually adjusted in order to reserve more or less memory

Item.Name: Error Conditions
Item.Description: Bitmap Bit 0: No valid program Bit 1: Missing configuration objects Bit 2: Missing configuration resources Bit 3: Invalid inputs Bit 4: Invalid outputs Bit 5: Invalid function format Bit 6: Out of storage memory Bit 7: Out of runtime memory Bit 8..31: reserved for future use

Item.Name: Clear errors
Item.Description: When executed, clears temporary error conditions. To be noted that some of the errors may require to change the content of other objects to be completely cleared.

Item.Name: Supported Capabilities
Item.Description: Bitmap Bit 0: Astronomical Events Bit 1: Single sensor Inputs Bit 2: Multi Sensor Inputs Bit 3: Input Filters Bit 4: Output Filters Bit 5: Calendar Bit 6: Compound Operations Bit 7: Second granularity (for fixed time expressions) Bit 8: Astronomical Midnight Bit 9: Off when inactive

Item.Name: Max Dynamic Memory Allocated
Item.Description: Max RAM memory (in bytes) to be allocated. Can be eventually adjusted in order to reserve more or less memory

Item.Name: Reset schedule objects
Item.Description: When executed, trigger a complete wipe of schedules already commissioned
